name: Principle of Karma
description:
Principle of Karma



Rules are simple:
Birth-Life-Death-Repeat

Your Soul will be trapped in a loop until You reach JOY!
Ghosts will help



PoK is an extraordinary Puzzle Platformer.
SIngle Player Co-Op You might say.

Retro computer`s history from monochromatic picture from early 80`s to CGA or Amiga.
55 levels of a brain-training puzzles and relaxation.
Enjoy! Make it count!
